attributes.title: What even is this???
attributes.review: People kept talking about how bad the app was so, even though I despise Trump and his past AND current actions/words, I decided to check it out. It took almost 30 minutes to download and once I got in, I’m kept on kicking me out. Then again I didn’t want to see that perverted tangerine anyways so I’m glad that it did🧚🏻✨

attributes.title: This app is horrible, please for your sake don’t download it
attributes.review: So I downloaded it just to check out what’s up with our dear president and his app, what happened I can’t even put into words and I’m in tears over what happened, please for your sake just don’t download it and if you already have it downloaded delete it before it’s too late!

attributes.title: DONT BUY!! WARNING
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with high hopes because i heard from my friends it was their favorite game, but the moment i opened the app i was shocked to see a video of donald trump MADDDDD throating a 12 inch glizzy w extra mayo 🤢🤢🤢 I instantly tried deleting the app but it wouldn’t work and then i got a text from trump himself asking to come over and eat the glizzies from my HOME! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: This app just hacked all of my other apps and fails and it makes my phone lagging,And they will always send me a lot of notifications even though the notifications are turned off i don’t recommend download it because why would anyone want their phones to be hacked.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: The app took about 4 hours to install and then it disabled my phone and shut it down. When I finally got it up and running all of my information about me and what apps were used have been hacked. This app is terrible and if you want all your information to get hacked go download the stupid app

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD! UGH😤😤😩
attributes.review: I wouldn’t download until like a couple days and something happened I’m still not sure, I can’t log in to some of my socials now! And most account got hacked and it left a bug, had to get my phone fixed because of all the chaos! Took forever idk if it was just my phone but don’t recommend downloading!!!🥵☠️😡

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: If I could leave a 0 star review I would. Didn’t work correctly and when it did felt like something straight out of George Orwell’s 1984. Really creepy. Sometimes I thought I heard my phone giving feedback like someone was on a call listening to me, one time I even heard breathing from the other end.

attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: Ive downloaded a lot of apps in my life but this one immediately told me to go back to my country as soon as I logged in. Also all my data was mined without proper consent which is illegal and a serious issue especially if this is going to the government. I hope in the future there are better apps from cheeto puffs.

attributes.title: hi HONEY I’M GONNA
attributes.review: Hi honey I’m gonna was your birthday dinner for y’all today and then you guys can come back up to me omg was a way of a long time I was gonna was the ice cold day I was like oh wow I love y’all and so I love y’all and I’m so tired of you and I’m gonna I wanna see y’all this week and I’m so tired and I’m tired and tired I’m tired and I love you too much and I’m sorry you baby girl you love you so sweet omg omg was the 🤬

attributes.title: Threats????
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app an unknown number texted me and said they had all my private information and unless I voted for tr*mp it would all be released and my bank accounts would be drained. If you’re reading this review then please don’t vote for this barbaric ape that thinks it’s okay to r*pe and use women as well as be a racist power hungry a******* for absolutely no reason😁😁
